name: Jackal
movement: 40 feet walking speed, agile and quick
description: Jackals are small, slender creatures with sharp teeth and a keen sense of smell, built for speed and agility.
memorable: Despite their small size, jackals are cunning and opportunistic, often hunting in packs and taking advantage of weaknesses.
goals: To scavenge for food and hunt in small packs.
relations: Often found in the company of other jackals, utilizing pack tactics to hunt larger prey.
environment: Commonly found in deserts, savannas, and arid plains.
strengths: Keen hearing and smell, high perception, and enhanced effectiveness in groups due to pack tactics.
weaknesses: Low hit points and armor class, making them vulnerable to stronger creatures.
attacks: Bite attack that deals minimal piercing damage but can inflict a debilitating disease.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics, granting advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
senses: Heightened hearing and smell grant advantage on perception checks related to these senses.
skills: Proficient in perception, making it adept at noticing threats and prey.
additional_information: Utilizes pack tactics for coordinated hunting.
Capable of inflicting shriveling fever disease on successful bite.
Relies on agility and cunning rather than brute strength.
test_queries: small quick predator with keen senses
scavenger with sharp teeth and agility
cunning small beast known for stealth
